name: Dungeon Survival Platformer
description:
It's a dungeon survival platformer type of game, I hope you don't have arachnaphobia ;)

I hope you have fun and enjoy

This is a Beta version to the Mini Game Jam themed "Web" WITHOUT GROUND (kind of, there's holes in the floor so it counts)

 Here's the link to the source code: https://github.com/DEPRobotics

/Dungeon-Survival
